remarks: Change the bound variable of a restricted uniqueness quantifier using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbvralv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvreuv $p |- ( E! x e. A ph <-> E! y e. A ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
